name: Rocket Science Sandbox
description:
Rocket Science Sandbox is the game where you build and launch your own rockets!

Get contracts and earn funds for your next big project, what will it be?

VERSION 0.2c VISUAL OVER HAUL + MAJOR FIXES!

Controls:

CHEATS: '5' to replentish fuel.

W,A,S,D, to steer rocket.

 LShift and LCtrl to change throttle. SPACE to toggle engine.

G to toggle landing gear.

To do list:

*Make factory usable, add customizability.

*Add orbital mechanics

*Add navball
